quiz.question: ___ axle
quiz.explanation: 车轴，汽车车轴。The car axle needed repair. 汽车车轴需要修理。

quiz.question: guzzle ____
quiz.explanation: 狂饮，狂饮啤酒。Don't guzzle beer so quickly. 不要这么快狂饮啤酒。

quiz.question: defame _ _____
quiz.explanation: 诽谤，诽谤对手。He tried to defame a rival in the campaign. 他试图在竞选中诽谤对手。

quiz.question: enflame ________
quiz.explanation: 激起，激起激情。The speech would enflame passions. 演讲会激起激情。

quiz.question: tame ______
quiz.explanation: 驯服的，驯服的动物。The tame animal obeyed commands. 驯服的动物服从命令。

quiz.question: _____ ___ acme
quiz.explanation: 顶点，达到顶点。She would reach the acme of her career. 她会达到职业生涯的顶点。

quiz.question: sublime ______
quiz.explanation: 崇高的，崇高的美。The mountain had sublime beauty. 山有崇高的美。

quiz.question: _____ pantomime
quiz.explanation: 哑剧，喜剧哑剧。The actor performed a comic pantomime. 演员表演了喜剧哑剧。

quiz.question: prime _______
quiz.explanation: 主要的，主要嫌疑人。He was the prime suspect. 他是主要嫌疑人。

quiz.question: ragtime _____
quiz.explanation: 拉格泰姆音乐，拉格泰姆音乐。Ragtime music was popular in the early 1900s. 拉格泰姆音乐在20世纪初很流行。

quiz.question: maritime ___
quiz.explanation: 海事的，海事法。Maritime law governs ocean disputes. 海事法管理海洋争端。

quiz.question: domed ____
quiz.explanation: 圆顶，圆顶屋顶。The building had a domed roof. 建筑有圆顶屋顶。

quiz.question: _____ genome
quiz.explanation: 基因组，人类基因组。Scientists mapped the human genome. 科学家绘制了人类基因组。

quiz.question: ______ gnome
quiz.explanation: 侏儒，花园侏儒。A garden gnome decorated the lawn. 花园侏儒装饰着草坪。

quiz.question: frolicsome _______
quiz.explanation: 爱嬉戏的，爱嬉戏的小狗。The frolicsome puppies played all day. 爱嬉戏的小狗整天玩耍。

quiz.question: wholesome ____
quiz.explanation: 有益健康的，有益健康的饮食。She maintained a wholesome diet. 她保持有益健康的饮食。

quiz.question: mettlesome _____
quiz.explanation: 精神抖擞的，精神抖擞的马。The mettlesome horse was spirited. 精神抖擞的马很有活力。

quiz.question: noisome ____
quiz.explanation: 恶臭的，恶臭的气味。A noisome odor filled the room. 恶臭的气味充满了房间。

quiz.question: irksome ____
quiz.explanation: 令人厌烦的，令人厌烦的任务。Filing paperwork was an irksome task. 归档文件是令人厌烦的任务。

quiz.question: fulsome ______
quiz.explanation: 过分的，过分的赞美。The fulsome praise seemed insincere. 过分的赞美似乎不真诚。

quiz.question: winsome _____
quiz.explanation: 迷人的，迷人的微笑。She had a winsome smile. 她有迷人的微笑。

quiz.question: _____ chromosome
quiz.explanation: 染色体，人类染色体。Human chromosome carry genetic information. 人类染色体携带遗传信息。

quiz.question: cumbersome _______
quiz.explanation: 笨重的，笨重的过程。The application was a cumbersome process. 申请是笨重的过程。

quiz.question: lissome ______
quiz.explanation: 柔软的，柔软的身材。The gymnast had a lissome figure. 体操运动员有柔软的身材。

quiz.question: ___ epitome __
quiz.explanation: 典范，典范。He was the epitome of elegance. 他是优雅的典范。

quiz.question: exhume _______
quiz.explanation: 挖出，挖出遗体。Authorities would exhume remains for investigation. 当局会挖出遗体进行调查。

quiz.question: subsume _____
quiz.explanation: 归入，归入之下。We can subsume under this category. 我们可以归入这一类之下。

quiz.question: résumé ______
quiz.explanation: 简历，简历更新。She needed to résumé update before applying. 她在申请前需要简历更新。

quiz.question: _________ costume
quiz.explanation: 服装，万圣节服装。Children wore Halloween costume. 孩子们穿万圣节服装。

quiz.question: rhyme ______
quiz.explanation: 韵律，韵律方案。The poem had a complex rhyme scheme. 这首诗有复杂的韵律方案。

quiz.question: _________ enzyme
quiz.explanation: 酶，消化酶。Digestive enzyme break down food. 消化酶分解食物。

quiz.question: bane __ _________
quiz.explanation: 祸根，生存的祸根。Traffic was the bane of existence for commuters. 交通是通勤者生存的祸根。

quiz.question: _______ cane
quiz.explanation: 手杖，步行手杖。The elderly man used a walking cane. 老人使用步行手杖。

quiz.question: arcane ____
quiz.explanation: 神秘的，神秘的知识。He studied arcane lore. 他研究神秘的知识。

quiz.question: ultramundane _______
quiz.explanation: 超世俗的，超世俗的事务。They discussed ultramundane matters. 他们讨论超世俗的事务。

quiz.question: profane ________
quiz.explanation: 亵渎的，亵渎的语言。Avoid using profane language. 避免使用亵渎的语言。

quiz.question: germane ______
quiz.explanation: 相关的，相关的评论。That's a germane remark. 那是相关的评论。

quiz.question: humane _________
quiz.explanation: 人道的，人道的待遇。Animals deserve humane treatment. 动物应得人道的待遇。

quiz.question: inhumane _________
quiz.explanation: 不人道的，不人道的待遇。The prisoners suffered inhumane treatment. 囚犯遭受不人道的待遇。

quiz.question: ______ pane
quiz.explanation: 窗格，窗户窗格。The window pane was cracked. 窗户窗格裂了。

quiz.question: ____ membrane
quiz.explanation: 膜，细胞膜。The cell membrane controls what enters. 细胞膜控制进入的物质。

quiz.question: sane ________
quiz.explanation: 理智的，理智的判断。He made a sane judgment. 他做出了理智的判断。

quiz.question: ____ hygiene
quiz.explanation: 卫生，良好的卫生。Maintain good hygiene habits. 保持良好的卫生习惯。

quiz.question: serene ____
quiz.explanation: 宁静的，宁静的湖。The serene lake was peaceful. 宁静的湖很平静。

quiz.question: _____ gangrene
quiz.explanation: 坏疽，治疗坏疽。Doctors must treat gangrene quickly. 医生必须迅速治疗坏疽。

quiz.question: contravene ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 违反，违反法律。His actions would contravene the law. 他的行为会违反法律。

quiz.question: convene _______
quiz.explanation: 召集，召集会议。The board will convene meeting tomorrow. 董事会明天将召集会议。

quiz.question: intervene ________
quiz.explanation: 干预，直接干预。The government may intervene directly. 政府可能直接干预。

quiz.question: recombine _____
quiz.explanation: 重组，重组基因。Scientists can recombine genes. 科学家可以重组基因。

quiz.question: internecine ___
quiz.explanation: 内讧的，内讧的战争。Internecine war destroyed the faction. 内讧的战争摧毁了派系。

quiz.question: porcine ________
quiz.explanation: 猪的，猪的特征。He had somewhat porcine features. 他有有点猪的特征。

quiz.question: iodine ________
quiz.explanation: 碘，碘溶液。Apply iodine solution to the wound. 在伤口上涂碘溶液。

quiz.question: ____ _ seine
quiz.explanation: 围网，撒围网。Fishermen would cast a seine. 渔民会撒围网。

quiz.question: outshine ______
quiz.explanation: 胜过，胜过对手。Her performance would outshine rivals. 她的表现会胜过对手。

quiz.question: decline __ _____
quiz.explanation: 拒绝，拒绝提议。He chose to decline an offer. 他选择拒绝提议。

quiz.question: recline ____
quiz.explanation: 倾斜，倾斜座椅。The recline seat was comfortable. 倾斜座椅很舒适。

quiz.question: feline _____
quiz.explanation: 猫科的，猫科的优雅。The dancer moved with feline grace. 舞者以猫科的优雅移动。

quiz.question: aquiline ____
quiz.explanation: 鹰钩的，鹰钩鼻。He had an aquiline nose. 他有鹰钩鼻。

quiz.question: ____ discipline
quiz.explanation: 纪律，自律。Success requires self discipline. 成功需要自律。

quiz.question: outline ______
quiz.explanation: 轮廓，轮廓草图。He drew an outline sketch. 他画了轮廓草图。

quiz.question: _________ byline
quiz.explanation: 署名，报纸署名。The newspaper byline identified the author. 报纸署名标明了作者。

quiz.question: ______ famine
quiz.explanation: 饥荒，严重的饥荒。The country suffered a severe famine. 该国遭受了严重的饥荒。

quiz.question: antihistamine ____
quiz.explanation: 抗组胺药，抗组胺药物。Take an antihistamine drug for allergies. 服用抗组胺药物治疗过敏。

quiz.question: undermine _____
quiz.explanation: 破坏，破坏信任。Lies will undermine trust. 谎言会破坏信任。

quiz.question: canine _____
quiz.explanation: 犬齿，犬齿。The canine tooth is pointed. 犬齿是尖的。

quiz.question: asinine _______
quiz.explanation: 愚蠢的，愚蠢的错误。That was an asinine mistake. 那是愚蠢的错误。

quiz.question: saturnine ___________
quiz.explanation: 阴郁的，阴郁的性情。He had a saturnine temperament. 他有阴郁的性情。

quiz.question: pine ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 思念，思念家乡。He would pine for home. 他会思念家乡。

quiz.question: repine __ ____
quiz.explanation: 抱怨，抱怨命运。Don't repine at fate. 不要抱怨命运。

quiz.question: vulpine _______
quiz.explanation: 狡猾的，狡猾的狡诈。He showed vulpine cunning. 他表现出狡猾的狡诈。

quiz.question: opine __ ______
quiz.explanation: 表示意见，对政策表示意见。Experts would opine on policy. 专家会对政策表示意见。

quiz.question: margarine ______
quiz.explanation: 人造黄油，人造黄油涂抹。Use margarine spread on toast. 在吐司上使用人造黄油涂抹。

quiz.question: saccharine _____
quiz.explanation: 矫揉造作的，矫揉造作的微笑。Her saccharine smile seemed fake. 她矫揉造作的微笑似乎是假的。

quiz.question: marine _________
quiz.explanation: 海洋的，海洋生物学家。The marine biologist studied coral. 海洋生物学家研究珊瑚。

quiz.question: ______ shrine
quiz.explanation: 神社，神道神社。They visited a Shinto shrine. 他们参观了神道神社。

quiz.question: enshrine __________
quiz.explanation: 铭记，铭记原则。The constitution would enshrine principles. 宪法会铭记原则。

quiz.question: _________ doctrine
quiz.explanation: 教义，宗教教义。They followed religious doctrine. 他们遵循宗教教义。

quiz.question: ____ figurine
quiz.explanation: 小雕像，陶土小雕像。She collected clay figurine. 她收集陶土小雕像。

quiz.question: tambourine ______
quiz.explanation: 铃鼓，铃鼓节奏。The tambourine rhythm added energy. 铃鼓节奏增添了活力。

quiz.question: ______ cuisine
quiz.explanation: 烹饪，法国烹饪。French cuisine is world famous. 法国烹饪举世闻名。

quiz.question: ursine ________
quiz.explanation: 熊的，熊的力量。He had ursine strength. 他有熊的力量。

quiz.question: _______ limousine
quiz.explanation: 豪华轿车，加长豪华轿车。They arrived in a stretch limousine. 他们乘坐加长豪华轿车到达。

quiz.question: elephantine ____
quiz.explanation: 笨重的，笨重的体积。The elephantine bulk was impressive. 笨重的体积令人印象深刻。

quiz.question: ______ quarantine
quiz.explanation: 隔离，实施隔离。Authorities would impose quarantine. 当局会实施隔离。

quiz.question: byzantine ___________
quiz.explanation: 复杂的，复杂的官僚机构。The byzantine bureaucracy was confusing. 复杂的官僚机构令人困惑。

quiz.question: ___ ___ guillotine
quiz.explanation: 断头台，使用断头台。They would use the guillotine for execution. 他们会使用断头台处决。

quiz.question: libertine _________
quiz.explanation: 放荡的，放荡的生活方式。He led a libertine lifestyle. 他过着放荡的生活方式。

quiz.question: predestine ____
quiz.explanation: 预定，预定命运。Some believe fate is predestined. 有些人相信命运是预定的。

quiz.question: clandestine _______
quiz.explanation: 秘密的，秘密的会议。They held a clandestine meeting. 他们举行了秘密的会议。

quiz.question: _____ intestine
quiz.explanation: 肠，小肠。The small intestine absorbs nutrients. 小肠吸收营养。

quiz.question: ________ philistine
quiz.explanation: 庸俗的人，文化庸俗的人。He was a cultural philistine. 他是文化庸俗的人。

quiz.question: pristine _________
quiz.explanation: 原始的，原始的状态。The car was in pristine condition. 汽车处于原始的状态。

quiz.question: sanguine _______
quiz.explanation: 乐观的，乐观的展望。He maintained a sanguine outlook. 他保持乐观的展望。

quiz.question: genuine _______
quiz.explanation: 真正的，真正的皮革。The bag was made of genuine leather. 包是用真正的皮革制成的。

quiz.question: equine _______
quiz.explanation: 马的，马疗法。Equine therapy helps with disabilities. 马疗法有助于治疗残疾。

quiz.question: divine ____________
quiz.explanation: 神圣的，神圣的干预。They prayed for divine intervention. 他们祈求神圣的干预。

quiz.question: bovine _____
quiz.explanation: 牛的，牛血清。Bovine serum is used in research. 牛血清用于研究。

quiz.question: _____ intertwine
quiz.explanation: 缠绕，藤蔓缠绕。The vines intertwine together. 藤蔓缠绕在一起。

quiz.question: _____-__ comedienne
quiz.explanation: 女喜剧演员，单口女喜剧演员。The stand-up comedienne was hilarious. 单口女喜剧演员非常搞笑。

quiz.question: _______ cone
quiz.explanation: 锥体，交通锥体。Place traffic cone around the work zone. 在工作区周围放置交通锥体。
